description: Presidential Secretariat - Notifying that Hon. Karunarathna Paranawithanage MP. has resigned the Office of the Deputy Minister of Provincial Councils & Local Government w.e.f. 03.12.2015 & appointed him as the Deputy Minister of Parliamentary Reforms & Mass Media w.e.f. 04.12.2015. Changed the portfolios of Hon. Mano Ganesan MP. as the Minister of National Co-existence, Dialogue & Official Languages w.e.f. 08.12.2015 & of Hon. Piyankara Jayaratna, MP. as the State Minister of Law & Order & Southern Development w.e.f. 11.11.2015
